description: Next.js + Supabase migration of Fielder harvest prediction platform

features.name: Project Setup
features.completion_notes: Created fielder-nextjs with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind, @supabase/supabase-js

features.name: Supabase Schema
steps: Define schema: crops, cultivars, rootstocks, regions
features.completion_notes: Created migrations/001_initial_schema.sql with all tables. Seed scripts for regions (21 regions) and crops (15 crops) ready. User needs to create Supabase project and run migrations.

features.name: TypeScript Services
features.completion_notes: Ported gdd-calculator.ts, weather.ts, harvest-predictor.ts. Quality predictor sugar/acid estimation included in harvest-predictor.

features.name: API Routes
features.completion_notes: Created /api/predict, /api/crops, /api/regions, /api/weather/gdd. Farm CRUD deferred to when Supabase connected.

features.name: Consumer Discovery UI
features.completion_notes: Created /discover page with region selector, At Peak Now section, crop cards with status badges. Calendar view deferred.

features.name: Farm Dashboard UI
features.completion_notes: Created /farm page with admin code protection and dashboard skeleton. Full CRUD features marked as 'Coming Soon' pending Supabase integration.

features.name: Vercel Deployment
features.completion_notes: Created GitHub repo at balexbrownii/fielder-nextjs. Deployed to Vercel at https://fielder-nextjs.vercel.app. Environment variables configured for Supabase and admin code.
